title.en: Psychomotor Development and Mental Health of Children
title.et: Laste psühhomotoorne areng ja vaimne tervis

structural_unit_name.en: Institute of Sport Sciences and Physiotherapy

description.en: The course provides an overview of the most common psychiatric disorders among children and youth, discusses possible problems and peculiarities in the physiotherapeutic treatment of children with mental disorders, learns to apply various therapeutic techniques in the treatment of children and youth with mental disorders and receieves knowledge of the age-related aspects of the development of physical abilities of children with normal development.
description.et: Aines antakse ülevaade enamlevinud psühhiaatrilistest häiretest laste ja noorte seas, arutletakse võimalike probleemide ja eripärade üle psüühikahäirega laste ja noorte füsioterapeutilises käsitluses, õpitakse rakendama erinevaid teraapiavõtteid psüühikahäirega laste ravis ning antakse teadmised normarenguga laste kehaliste võimete arendamise ealistest aspektidest.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to provide students with knowledge and practical skills for working in physiotherapy with psychiatrically ill children and youth. To provide knowledge about the age characteristics of the development of children's physical abilities.
objectives.et: Ainekursuse õpetamise eesmärgiks on anda teadmised ja praktilised oskused töötamaks füsioteraapia valdkonnas psühhiaatriliste häiretega laste ja noortega. Anda teadmised laste kehaliste võimete arendamise ealistest iseärasustest.

learning_outcomes.en: 1. Knows the most common psychiatric disorders among children and youth and their main symptoms;
learning_outcomes.et: 1. Teab enamlevinud psühhiaatrilisi häireid lastel ja nende peamisi sümptomeid;

learning_outcomes.en: 2. Is able to recognize a patient with psychiatric disorder and takes into account possible peculiarities when communicating with the child;
learning_outcomes.et: 2. Oskab ära tunda psühhiaatrilise häirega lapse/noore ja arvestab võimalike eripäradega temaga suhtlemisel;

learning_outcomes.en: 3. Analyzes possible obstacles occurring during therapy process with psychiatric patients and is able to find solutions;
learning_outcomes.et: 3. Analüüsib võimalikke takistavaid tegureid füsioteraapia läbiviimisel vaimse tervise häirega noorte ja laste puhul ning oskab leida lahendusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 4. Implements a variety of therapies used within mental health physiotherapy to treat children and youth with psychiatric disorders;
learning_outcomes.et: 4. Rakendab erinevaid vaimse tervise füsioteraapias kasutatavaid teraapiavõtteid ja üldiseid ravipõhimõtteid tegelemaks psühhiaatriliste häiretega lapspatsientidega;

learning_outcomes.en: 5. Knows the age-related developmental stages and characteristics of the development of children's physical abilities.
learning_outcomes.et: 5. Teab laste kehaliste võimete arendamise ealisi arenguetappe ja iseärasusi.

description.et: -participation in all seminars and practical training. When being absent from a seminar or practical training the student must  submit a written essay based on the topic of the seminar/practical training.
-finishing all tests and assignments in Moodle (receiving 75% of correct answers).

grade_preconditions.et: Participating in all seminars and practical training sessions and passing tests and assignments in Moodle.

grade_evaluation.et: The student has completed tests and assignments in Moodle.
